agent_state.description: The agent's state. Allowed values are 'online', 'offline', 'away', or 'transfers_only'

available_time.description: Total time agent was available to answer calls and set to 'online'. Does not include time on calls or in wrap-up mode

away_time.description: Total time agent's status was set to 'away'

call_status.description: The agent's call status. Allowed values are 'on_call', 'wrap_up', or 'null'

calls_accepted.description: The total number of phone calls the agent has accepted

calls_denied.description: The total number of times the agent has declined an incoming call

calls_missed.description: The total number of times an agent has not answered their phone and the call was routed to the next available agent

forwarding_number.description: The forwarding number set up by the agent, or null if the agent has no forwarding number

online_time.description: Total time agent's status was set to 'online', 'away', or 'transfers_only'

transfers_only_time.description: Total time agent's status was set to 'transfers_only'

total_call_duration.description: Total time the agent was on call across all calls

total_talk_time.description: Total talk time (excludes hold time and consultation)

total_wrap_up_time.description: Total time spent in wrap-up across all calls

via.description: The channel (client/phone) the agent is registered on

accepted_third_party_conferences.description: The average number of conference calls accepted, the number accepted by the selected agent, and the percentage difference between the two

accepted_transfers.description: Total numbers of transfers the agent accepted

average_hold_time.description: Average time the agent spent on hold per call

average_talk_time.description: Average talk time across all calls (excludes hold time and consultation)

average_wrap_up_time.description: Average wrap-up time across all calls

calls_put_on_hold.description: Total number of calls the agent placed on hold

started_third_party_conferences.description: The average number of conference calls initiated, the number initiated by the selected agent, and the percentage difference between the two

started_transfers.description: Total numbers of transfers the agent started

total_hold_time.description: Total time the agent was on hold across all calls
